subject: How to add Test in JUnit 4.0?
msgSnippet: Hi Folks, i just try to understood JUnit 4. But i did not understand how I can add Test to AllTest.class. I add to the tests the Adapter public static
messageBody:
Hi Folks,

i just try to understood JUnit 4. But i did not understand how I can
add Test to AllTest.class.

I add to the tests the Adapter
public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
return new JUnit4TestAdapter(MoneyTest.class);
}

I try to load it into
public class AllTests {

public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
return new JUnit4TestAdapter(rogatio.modell.data.MoneyTest.class);
}

public static void main(String... args) {
//junit.textui.TestRunner.run(AllTests.suite());
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(rogatio.modell.data.MoneyTest.suite());
}

}

But i always get the Error.

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in AllTests
at junit.framework.Assert.fail(Assert.java:47)
at junit.framework.TestSuite$1.runTest(TestSuite.java:93)
at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:130)
at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:110)

What did i wrong? I searched google for examples, but didnt find a
working example. You tried it? How did a working example look?

Regards,
Matthias
